clean_data: Job Id 195308 Experience 1 to 13 Years Qualifications BBA Salary Range $55K$114K location Castries Country St Lucia latitude 139094 longitude  Work Type PartTime Company Size 37416 Job Posting Date 20221207 Preference Male Contact Person Ronald Cole Contact x333 Job Title Systems Engineer Role Systems Integration Specialist Job Portal Snagajob Job Description The role of a Systems Integration Specialist involves integrating various software and hardware components to create cohesive systems You will design and implement solutions that enable different systems to communicate and work together seamlessly Your responsibilities also include troubleshooting integration issues ensuring data consistency and collaborating with crossfunctional teams Benefits Tuition Reimbursement Stock Options or Equity Grants Parental Leave Wellness Programs Childcare Assistance skills Systems integration Integration architecture Data mapping Middleware technologies API integration System testing Troubleshooting Responsibilities Integrate various software and hardware systems within an organization ensuring seamless data flow and interoperability Collaborate with software developers and IT teams on integration projects Company Next plc Company Profile SectorRetailIndustryRetail  ApparelCityLeicesterStateN/AZipN/AWebsite Wolfson
